sweep.description: Swings a two handed melee weapon in a circle, knocking back some monsters around the character.

vaal_sweep.description: Repeatedly swings a staff or a two-handed axe or mace in a circle, knocking back monsters away from the character.

ground_slam.description: The character slams the ground in front of them with their main hand weapon, creating a wave that travels forward and damages enemies with an increased chance to stun. Only works with Staves or Maces.

vaal_ground_slam.description: The character slams the ground with their main hand weapon, creating a wave that travels in all directions and damages enemies. Only works with Staves or Maces.

cleave.description: The character swings their weapon (or both weapons if dual wielding) in an arc towards the target. Also does damage to other nearby monsters. Only works with Axes and Swords.

shield_charge.description: Charges at an enemy, bashing it with the character's shield and striking it. This knocks it back and stuns it. Enemies in the way are pushed to the side. Damage and stun are proportional to distance travelled. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.

new_shield_charge.description: Charges at a targeted location or enemy, pushing away enemies in your path and repeatedly dealing damage in a small area in front of you. You deal damage in a larger area when you reach the target. The further you travel, the more damage you deal, and the greater your chance of stunning enemies. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.

enduring_cry.description: Performs a warcry, adding endurance charges proportional to the number of surrounding enemies and granting life regeneration to you for a short time if there are nearby enemies. Taunts all nearby enemies to attack the user. Shares a cooldown with other Warcry skills.

inspiring_cry.description: Performs a warcry, granting increased damage and mana regeneration to the user and nearby allies if there are nearby enemies. The damage increase is proportional to the number of surrounding enemies. Taunts all nearby enemies to attack the user. Shares a cooldown with other Warcry skills.

abyssal_cry.description: Performs a warcry, Hindering nearby enemies and causing them to explode when killed. The Hinder effect is proportional to the number of surrounding enemies. Taunts all nearby enemies to attack the user. Shares a cooldown with other Warcry skills.

leap_slam.description: Jump into the air, damaging enemies (and knocking back some) with your main hand where you land. Enemies you would land on are pushed out of the way. Requires an axe, mace, sword or staff. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.

double_strike.description: Performs two fast attacks on target enemy with your main hand melee weapon.

vaal_double_strike.description: Performs two fast attacks on target enemy with your main hand melee weapon, and summons your double for a duration to continuously attack monsters in this fashion.

elemental_hit.description: A standard attack (with any weapon) that adds damage of a random element.

immortal_call.description: Discharges Endurance Charges, making the character invulnerable to physical damage for a short time, proportional to how many endurance charges were expended.

vaal_immortal_call.description: Discharges Endurance Charges, making the character unable to die for a short time, proportional to how many endurance charges were expended.

dual_strike.description: Attacks with both weapons, dealing the damage of both in one strike. Dual wield only. Does not work with wands.

blade_flurry.description: Dive through enemies, dealing weapon damage. Only works with daggers, claws and one handed swords. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.

frenzy.description: Performs an attack that gives the character a frenzy charge if it hits. Frenzy charges increase your attack speed.

caustic_arrow.description: Fires an arrow which deals additional chaos damage to enemies it hits, and creates a caustic cloud. Enemies in the cloud take chaos damage over time.

backstab.description: A dagger skill that deals a critical strike and additional damage to an enemy if the attack is made from behind the enemy. Has high mana cost and cooldown

detonate_dead.description: Targets a corpse, and deals spell damage to enemies around the corpse, as well as causing the corpse to explode, dealing fire damage. The explosion is not affected by modifiers to spell damage and cannot be reflected.

vaal_detonate_dead.description: Explodes an unused corpse, dealing fire damage to nearby enemies. Nearby corpses will also explode in a chain reaction. The explosions are not affected by modifiers to spell damage.

snipe.description: Fires an arrow at a target which deals high damage and always hits. The attack is slow and interruptable. It discharges frenzy charges by increasing the attack speed.

flicker_strike.description: Teleports the character to a nearby monster and attacks it with a melee weapon. If no specific monster is chosen, one is picked at random. The cooldown can be bypassed by expending a Frenzy Charge.

throw_skill.description: Throws a projectile version of the character's current weapon.

blood_rage.description: Adds a buff that deals Physical Damage over time, while increasing Attack Speed and Life Leech. Killing an enemy while this buff is active refreshes the buff duration, and can grant a Frenzy Charge.

split_arrow.description: Fires multiple arrows at different targets.

cold_snap.description: Ice crystals protrude from the ground at target location. Monsters in this area take damage and become frozen. The cooldown can be bypassed by expending a Power Charge.

vaal_cold_snap.description: A sequence of ice crystals erupts from the ground around the caster, damaging enemies and leaving the ground chilled.

ice_nova.description: A chilling circle of ice expands from the caster. If the caster targets near one of their Frostbolt projectiles, it will expand from the projectile instead.

vaal_ice_nova.description: A chilling circle of ice expands from the caster, repeating from every enemy it hits. If the caster targets near one of their Frostbolt projectiles, it will expand from the projectile instead.

ignite.description: Sets an enemy on fire from a distance.

fireball.description: Unleashes a ball of fire towards a target which explodes, damaging nearby foes.

vaal_fireball.description: Launches a series of fireballs in all directions around the caster.

arc.description: An arc of lightning stretches from the caster to a targeted nearby enemy and chains on to additional targets.

vaal_arc.description: An arc of lightning stretches from the caster to a targeted nearby enemy and chains on to many additional targets.

raise_zombie.description: Raises a zombie minion from a corpse, which will follow you and attack enemies with a melee attack and an area of effect slam which cannot be evaded.

righteous_fire.description: Engulfs you in magical fire that rapidly burns you and nearby enemies. Your spell damage is substantially increased while under this effect. The effect ends when you have 1 life remaining.

vaal_righteous_fire.description: A fiery blast removes your energy shield and all but 1 life, exploding outwards to deal fire damage to nearby enemies based on the life and energy shield lost.

fire_weapon.description: Infuse the player's current weapon with additional fire damage for a short time.

damage_infusion.description: Moves damage from nearby enemies to the target enemy. They are healed for the amount of damage moved.

discharge.description: Discharge all the character's charges to deal elemental damage to all nearby monsters.

town_portal.description: Creates a portal to the current area's town.

vaal_breach.description: Creates a breach, making you vulnerable to its powerful inhabitants.

melee.description: Strike your foes down with a powerful blow.

spark.description: Launches unpredictable sparks that move randomly until they hit an enemy or expire.

vaal_spark.description: Continuously launches unpredictable sparks in all directions that move randomly until they hit an enemy or expire.

ice_spear.description: Launches a shard of ice that pierces close enemies, before exploding on a distant enemy with a much higher critical strike chance.

raise_spectre.description: Raises a spectral version of a defeated foe as a minion to fight for you in battle.

infernal_blow.description: Hits the enemy, converting some of your physical damage to fire damage. If the enemy dies soon after being hit, they will explode, dealing fire damage to nearby enemies. The damage from this explosion cannot be reflected. Requires a Sword, Axe, Mace, Staff or Unarmed.

glacial_hammer.description: Hits the enemy, converting some of your physical damage to cold damage. If the enemy is frozen and is on less than one third life, they will shatter when hit by Glacial Hammer. Requires a Mace or Staff.

vaal_glacial_hammer.description: Hits the enemy, converting some of your physical damage to cold damage. It traps the enemy with you in a circle of ice so that it can't escape. Requires a Mace or Staff.

frost_wall.description: Creates a wall of ice which holds back enemies. Targets under the wall are damaged and pushed back.

freezing_pulse.description: An icy projectile which has a chance to freeze enemies it passes through. The projectile fades quickly, reducing damage and freezing chance until it runs out of time and dissipates completely.

shock_nova.description: Casts a shocking ring of lightning which deals damage to monsters it touches. Monsters in the centre of the ring receive no damage.

viper_strike.description: Hits the enemy, adding some of your physical damage as chaos damage and applying poison. Requires a claw, dagger or sword.

phase_run.description: Gain a buff that makes you move faster, become harder to detect, and no longer have your movement impeded by enemies. Your next attack also deals extra damage. Performing any skill removes this buff but grants a new buff that increases the damage of your attacks for a short time. Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.

explosive_arrow.description: Fires an arrow which acts as a short duration fuse. Applying additional arrows to an enemy extends the duration. When the target dies or the fuses expire, the arrows explode, dealing fire AoE damage to nearby enemies. The AoE radius is proportional to the number of arrows upon death.

temporal_chains.description: Curses all targets in an area, Slowing them, and making effects on them expire more slowly.

elemental_weakness.description: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to elemental damage.

warlords_mark.description: Curses all targets in an area, making them more vulnerable to stuns. Hitting the cursed targets will leech life and mana, and killing them will result in a chance to gain an endurance charge.

punishment.description: Curses all targets in an area, causing them to suffer some of the physical damage they deal with their attacks.

enfeeble.description: Curses all targets in an area, making their attacks and spells less effective.

assassins_mark.description: Curses all targets in an area, making them more vulnerable to Critical Strikes. Killing the cursed targets will grant life and mana, and a chance to gain a power charge.

projectile_weakness.description: Curses all targets in an area, making them easier to pierce and to knock back, and increasing the damage they take from projectiles.

vulnerability.description: Curse all targets in an area, causing them to take increased physical damage and further increased physical damage over time. Attacks against cursed enemies have a chance to inflict bleeding and maim.

teleport_ball.description: Casts a delayed teleport to a target destination. When the teleport occurs, lightning damage is dealt to the area around both where the player was and where they teleported to.

vaal_lightning_warp.description: Casts a delayed teleport for nearby enemies to a target destination. When the teleport occurs, lightning damage is dealt to the enemies both before and after they teleport.

gladiator_boss_vaal_lightning_warp.description: Casts a delayed teleport for nearby enemies to a target destination. When the teleport occurs, lightning damage is dealt to the enemies both before and after they teleport.

summon_skeletons.description: Summons a slow moving skeletal minion that dies after a duration. Does not require a corpse to be consumed.

vaal_summon_skeletons.description: Summons an army of skeletal warriors, archers and mages, led by a powerful general.

heavy_strike.description: Attacks the enemy with a forceful blow, knocking them back. Requires a Mace, Axe, Sword or Two-Handed Weapon.

vaal_heavy_strike.description: Attacks the enemy with a forceful blow, sending them flying backwards. Requires a Mace, Axe, Sword or Two-Handed Weapon.

conversion_strike.description: Attacks the enemy with a melee strike. If a non-unique enemy is killed shortly after being hit by Dominating Blow, that enemy is revived as a minion until the skill duration ends.

rain_of_arrows.description: Fires a large number of arrows into the air, to land at the target after a short delay.

vaal_rain_of_arrows.description: Fires a large number of arrows into the air, to land at the target after a short delay. Enemies hit by the arrows are pinned in place, unable to move for a time.

fire_storm.description: Flaming bolts rain down over the targeted area. They explode when landing, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

ice_storm.description: Icy bolts rain down over the targeted area. They explode when landing, dealing damage to nearby enemies and chilling them, as well as causing patches of chilled ground. Skill damage is based on Intelligence.

lightning_strike.description: Infuses your melee weapon with electrical energies as you swing. In addition to converting some of your physical damage to lightning damage, the stored energy is released from the weapon as projectiles as you strike, flying out behind your target to hit farther-away enemies. The projectiles cannot miss if the melee attack hit its target.

vaal_lightning_strike.description: Infuses your melee weapon with electrical energies as you swing. In addition to converting some of your physical damage to lightning damage, the stored energy is forced into the enemy as you strike, electrically charging them for a duration, during which lightning will arc between them and other nearby enemies, dealing damage. This occurs even if the attack is dodged.

tempest_shield.description: Enchants your shield with the power of storms, which lashes out to deal arcing lightning damage to attackers when you block them. Blocking refreshes the duration of Tempest Shield.

molten_shell.description: Summons fiery elemental shields providing additional armour for a short duration. If cumulative physical damage prevented by your blocking or armour reaches a threshold, the shields explode outwards, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies.

vaal_molten_shell.description: Summons fiery elemental shields providing additional armour for a short duration. Whenever you prevent any amount of physical damage from a hit, the shields cause a burst of flame, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies.

power_siphon.description: Fires your wand, dealing increased damage and granting you a power charge if an enemy is killed by, or soon after, the hit.

vaal_power_siphon.description: Fires your wand simultaneously at all nearby enemies, culling those close to death and granting you a power charge for each. Cannot be supported by Volley.

puncture.description: Punctures the target, causing a bleeding debuff, which will be affected by modifiers to skill duration. Puncture works with bows, daggers, claws or swords.

lightning_arrow.description: Fires a charged arrow at the target, causing them to be struck by a bolt of lightning which damages nearby enemies.

haste.description: Casts an aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.

vaal_haste.description: Casts a temporary aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.

purity.description: Casts an aura that grants elemental resistances to you and your allies.

vitality.description: Casts an aura that grants life regeneration to you and your allies.

vaal_vitality.description: Casts a temporary aura that grants life regeneration to you and your allies.

discipline.description: Casts an aura that grants additional energy shield and increased energy shield recharge rate to you and your allies.

vaal_discipline.description: Casts a temporary aura that prevents energy shield recharge being delayed by damage taken for you and your allies.

grace.description: Casts an aura that grants evasion to you and your allies.

vaal_grace.description: Casts a temporary aura that grants you and your allies the ability to dodge attacks and spells.

determination.description: Casts an aura that grants armour to you and your allies.

vaal_determination.description: Casts a temporary aura that grants physical damage reduction and elemental resistances to you and your allies.

anger.description: Casts an aura that adds fire damage to the attacks and spells of you and your allies.

hatred.description: Casts an aura that increases the cold damage of you and your allies.

wrath.description: Casts an aura that adds lightning damage to the attacks of you and your allies, and makes your spells deal more lightning damage.

burning_arrow.description: Fires an arrow that deals fire damage to its target and has an increased chance of igniting it.

vaal_burning_arrow.description: Fires an arrow that explodes, dealing fire damage to its target and other nearby enemies, with an increased chance of igniting them.

clarity.description: Casts an aura that grants mana regeneration to you and your allies.

vaal_clarity.description: Casts a temporary aura that lets you and your allies cast skills without paying their mana costs.

detonate_mines.description: Detonates all the Remote Mines you have placed.

totem_earthquake.description: Summons a totem that shakes the earth around it, knocking back and damaging nearby enemies

totem_life_regen.description: Summons a totem that has an aura which regenerates life for you and your nearby allies.

trap_convert.description: Throws a trap that, when triggered by an enemy, converts that enemy to your side for a short duration. Does not affect unique monsters or players.

trap_beartrap.description: Throws a trap that damages and immobilises a single enemy.

mine_freeze.description: Lays a remote mine that you can detonate to freeze all enemies in the area.

trap_ground_fire.description: Throws a trap that explodes when triggered, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies and leaving an area of burning ground that damages enemies who walk through it.

ground_fire_self.description: Throws a trap that explodes when triggered, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies and leaving an area of burning ground that damages enemies who walk through it.

vaal_fire_trap.description: Throws multiple traps that explode when triggered, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies and leaving areas of burning ground that damages enemies who walk through them.

totem_taunt.description: Summons a totem that taunts nearby monsters to attack it.

totem_consume_corpse.description: Summons a totem that can consume nearby corpses. If you are hurt, it will destroy a corpse to leech life to you.

shadow_projectiles.description: Fires an arc of knives in front of the caster which deals physical damage.

shadow_projectiles_no_los.description: Fires an arc of knives in front of the caster which deals physical damage.

ice_shot.description: Fires an arrow that converts some physical damage to cold on its target and converts all physical damage to cold in a cone behind that target. Creates a patch of ground ice under the target.

piety_ice_shot.description: Fires an arrow that converts some physical damage to cold on its target and converts all physical damage to cold in a cone behind that target. Creates a patch of ground ice under the target.

arctic_breath.description: Fires a frozen skull projectile that leaves a trail of ground ice behind it. It explodes on impact, creating more ground ice and damaging targets within an area.

arctic_armour.description: Summons an icy shield that protects against physical and fire damage. It drains your mana while active and at a faster rate while you are moving. When you have no mana left, the skill turns off. While active, it leaves a trail of ground ice which lasts for a short duration.

totem_fire_spray.description: Summons a totem that fires a stream of flame at nearby enemies.

totem_fire_spray_entity.description: Summons a totem that fires a stream of flame at nearby enemies.

fire_weakness.description: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to fire damage and giving them a chance to be ignited by fire damage.

cold_weakness.description: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to cold damage and giving them a chance to be frozen by cold damage.

lightning_weakness.description: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to lightning damage and giving them a chance to be shocked by lightning damage.

ball_lightning.description: Fires a slow-moving projectile that periodically damages enemies in an area around it with bolts of lightning.

incinerate.description: Launches a torrent of fire from your hand. The longer you repeatedly cast the spell from the same location, the larger and more damaging the flames become.

incinerate_channel.description: Continuously launches a torrent of fire from your hand. The longer you channel this spell, the larger and more damaging the flames become.

cyclone.description: Damage enemies around you, then perform a spinning series of attacks as you travel to a target location. Cannot be supported by Multistrike or Ruthless.

vaal_cyclone.description: Spin and attack in place, damaging nearby enemies and pulling others towards you. Cannot be supported by Ruthless.

searing_bond.description: Summons a totem that casts a beam of fire at you and each other totem you control, dealing burning damage to enemies caught in the beam. Enemies near either end of a beam also suffer burning damage.

reave.description: Attacks a small area in front of you. Each Reave that hits an enemy increases the area of effect. The area is reset after a short period without hitting anything. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords.

vaal_reave.description: Repeatedly attacks a large area in different directions. Each Vaal Reave that hits an enemy increases the area of effect. The area is reset after a short period without hitting anything. Only works with Daggers, Claws, and One-Handed Swords.

lightning_projectile_trap.description: Throws a trap that launches a ring of projectiles through the enemy that set it off, dealing lightning damage to them and subsequent targets.

vaal_lightning_projectile_trap.description: Throws a trap that launches a ring of projectiles through the enemy that set it off, dealing lightning damage to them and subsequent targets and leaving a trail of shocking ground.

smoke_mine.description: Places a mine that will teleport you to it when detonated. It covers both your escape and arrival with a cloud of smoke that blinds enemies, and gives you a temporary buff to movement speed.

animate_armour.description: Animates a melee weapon or armour, attaching it to an invisible Guardian that fights by your side. Animating multiple items attaches them to the same Guardian. You cannot animate unidentified weapons.

thrown_weapon.description: Throws a spectral copy of your melee weapon. It flies out and then returns to you, in a spinning attack that strikes enemies in its path.

vaal_thrown_weapon.description: Throws a spectral copy of your melee weapon. It spirals out in a spinning attack that strikes enemies in its path.

animate_weapon.description: Animates a melee weapon to fight by your side. You cannot animate unidentified weapons.

animate_weapon_trigger.description: Animates a melee weapon to fight by your side. You cannot animate unidentified weapons.

fire_resist_aura.description: Casts an aura that grants fire resistance to you and your allies.

cold_resist_aura.description: Casts an aura that grants cold resistance to you and your allies.

lightning_resist_aura.description: Casts an aura that grants lightning resistance to you and your allies.

storm_call.description: Sets a marker at a location. After a short duration, lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers you've cast.

storm_call_no_los.description: Sets a marker at a location. After a short duration, lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers you've cast.

storm_call_self.description: Sets a marker at a location. After a short duration, lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers you've cast.

vaal_storm_call.description: Sets a marker at a location. While the marker remains, lightning strikes random enemies near it, dealing damage to them. After a short duration, a large bolt of lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers from this skill.

charged_blast.description: Channels to build up a large explosion. The longer you channel, the larger the area of effect and damage of the explosion. The explosion occurs after using another skill or after a short period without casting.

flameblast.description: Channels to build up a large explosion, which is released when you stop using the skill. The longer you channel, the larger the area of effect and damage of the explosion.

vaal_charged_blast.description: Targets an area and builds up a large explosion. The build-up speed is based on cast speed. The explosion occurs after it reaches 10 stacks.

vaal_charged_blast_triggerable.description: Targets an area and builds up a large explosion. The build-up speed is based on cast speed. The explosion occurs after it reaches 10 stacks.

barrage.description: After a short preparation time, you attack repeatedly with a ranged weapon. These attacks have a small randomised spread. Only works with Bows and Wands.

infernal_swarm.description: Fire damages and ignites those around a targeted enemy. This effect chains and repeats on other enemy targets.

summon_raging_spirit.description: Summons a short-lived flaming skull that rushes at nearby enemies and attacks them rapidly. Enemies will not directly engage these spirits, and can pass through them.

summon_raging_spirit_triggered.description: Summons a short-lived flaming skull that rushes at nearby enemies and attacks them rapidly. Enemies will not directly engage these spirits, and can pass through them.

flame_whip.description: Strikes enemies in front of you with a surge of flame. Burning enemies are dealt more damage.

desecrate.description: Desecrates the ground, summoning corpses and dealing chaos damage to all enemies in the area. The corpses will be chosen from the monsters in the current area and any Spectres that have existed in this instance.

flesh_offering.description: Consumes a corpse, which temporarily empowers your minions with swiftness. The skill consumes other nearby corpses, increasing the duration for each corpse consumed.

bone_offering.description: Consumes a corpse, granting all of your minions the power to block both attacks and spells. The skill consumes other nearby corpses, increasing the duration for each corpse consumed.

glacial_cascade.description: Icicles emerge from the ground in a series of small bursts, each damaging enemies caught in the area.

storm_cascade_player.description: Lightning crackles in a series of small bursts, each damaging enemies caught in the area.

molten_strike.description: Attacks a target with physical and fire damage, causing balls of molten magma to launch forth from your weapon as you swing. These will explode, causing AoE attack damage to enemies where they land.

convocation.description: Recalls all minions that are following you to your location, and grants them a temporary life regeneration effect.

fire_nova.description: Lay a remote mine that you can detonate to create a series of fire novas. Each sequential nova from the same mine will do higher damage than the previous.

tornado_shot.description: Fires a piercing shot that travels until it reaches the targeted location. It will then fire projectiles out in all directions from that point.

merveil_warp.description: Teleport to a target destination. Chilled ground is spread in an area around both where the caster was and where they teleported to.

herald_of_ash.description: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage. While you have this buff, if you kill an enemy, other enemies near them will be burned based on the overkill damage. The burn inflicted by this skill can only be affected by modifiers to damage over time (burning damage is damage over time).

herald_of_ice.description: Channel ice through your hands, adding cold damage to spells and attacks. If you shatter an enemy, they explode and deal AoE cold damage to enemies near them. The AoE cold damage inflicted by this skill is not affected by modifiers to spell damage.

herald_of_thunder.description: Channel lightning through your hands, adding lightning damage to spells and attacks. If you kill a shocked enemy, lightning bolts will strike enemies around you for a short duration. The lightning bolt damage inflicted by this skill is not affected by modifiers to spell damage.

consecrate.description: Creates an area of Consecrated Ground, providing life regeneration for you and allies who stand in it.

triggered_consecrate.description: Creates an area of Consecrated Ground, providing life regeneration for you and allies who stand in it.

poachers_mark.description: Curses all targets in an area, making them less evasive. Hitting the cursed targets will grant life and mana, and killing them will result in more flask charges and a chance to gain a frenzy charge.

lightning_tendrils.description: Lightning is released from your hands four times in quick succession, damaging all enemies in an arc in front of you.

lightning_tendrils_channelled.description: While you channel this skill, it releases pulses of electrical energy, dealing lightning damage in a semicircular area in front of you.

word_of_winter_when_hit.description: Unleashes an icy projectile that pulses with cold as it travels.

edict_of_winter_when_hit.description: Unleashes an icy projectile that pulses with cold as it travels.

decree_of_winter_when_hit.description: Unleashes an icy projectile that pulses with cold as it travels.

commandment_of_winter_when_hit.description: Unleashes an icy projectile that pulses with cold as it travels.

monster_mortar.description: Generic monster mortar skill. Like Monster Projectile but has an impact effect.

monster_mortar_attack.description: Generic monster mortar skill. Like Monster Projectile but has an impact effect.

kinetic_blast.description: Fires a projectile from a Wand that causes a series of small explosions surrounding its point of impact, each damaging enemies caught in the area.

blink_arrow.description: Fires an arrow at the target destination. When the arrow lands, you are teleported to it and a clone is summoned at your old location. The clone is a minion that uses your bow and quiver.

mirror_arrow.description: Fires an arrow at the target destination. When the arrow lands, a clone is summoned. The clone is a minion that uses your bow and quiver.

riposte.description: Perform a deadly counter-attack when you block. Uses both weapons while you're dual wielding.

reckoning.description: Perform a swift counter-attack against enemies in a cone shape when you block with your shield.

static_strike.description: Strike your enemies with a melee weapon, building up static energy on you. This energy damages enemies around you when it expires.

word_of_tempest_on_hit.description: Charges you with lightning which lasts a duration before unleashing, damaging surrounding enemies.

edict_of_tempest_on_hit.description: Charges you with lightning which lasts a duration before unleashing, damaging surrounding enemies.

decree_of_tempest_on_hit.description: Charges you with lightning which lasts a duration before unleashing, damaging surrounding enemies.

commandment_of_tempest_on_hit.description: Charges you with lightning which lasts a duration before unleashing, damaging surrounding enemies.

vengeance.description: Chance to perform a swift counter-attack against all enemies around you when you are hit. Weapon range increases the area of this attack. Requires a Melee Weapon.

summon_chaos_elemental.description: Summons a Chaos Golem that grants you Physical Damage Reduction. The Chaos Golem can use a damage over time Chaos aura and a cascade of Chaos spikes in addition to its melee attack.

summon_ice_elemental.description: Summons an Ice Golem that grants you increased Critical Strike Chance and Accuracy. The Ice Golem can use an icy barrage spell and a chilling spinning dash in addition to its melee attack.

summon_fire_elemental.description: Summons a Flame Golem that grants you increased Damage. The Flame Golem can use a fire spray, a wave of fire damage, and an explosive arcing projectile.

ice_crash.description: Slam the ground with your main hand weapon, damaging enemies in an area around the impact in three stages. Enemies take slightly less damage on the second and third stage. Works with Swords, Maces, Axes, Staves and Unarmed. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.

new_shock_nova.description: Casts a ring of Lightning around you, followed by a larger Lightning nova. Each effect hits enemies caught in their area with Lightning Damage.

flame_dash.description: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground in your wake.

vaal_aura_elemental_damage_healing.description: Casts an aura that causes taking elemental damage to heal you and nearby allies instead.

vigilant_strike.description: Attacks the enemy with a powerful melee strike. You gain the Fortify buff, granting damage reduction. The cooldown can be bypassed by expending an Endurance Charge. Requires a Melee Weapon.

frost_blades.description: Attack an enemy with increased range, releasing icy blades from the targeted enemy which fly at other enemies. Requires a Melee Weapon.

vulture_leap_slam.description: Jump into the air, damaging enemies (and knocking back some) with your main hand where you land. Enemies you would land on are pushed out of the way. Requires an axe, mace, sword or staff.

fire_mortar.description: Lob a fiery orb that explodes as it strikes the ground. The skill chains, releasing another fiery orb that repeats this effect.

new_punishment.description: Curses all targets in an area, causing them to grant a buff to anyone they hit with melee attacks. The buff grants more Melee Damage and increased Attack Speed.

new_arctic_armour.description: Conjures an icy barrier that chills enemies when they hit you. You drop chilled ground while moving, and take less Fire and Physical damage while stationary.

wild_strike.description: Your melee weapon strikes an enemy, converting physical damage to a random element. Then, depending on the element chosen, it releases a fiery explosion, an arcing bolt of lightning, or an icy wave.

trap_ice.description: Throws a trap that creates a series of icy runic explosions when triggered, dealing cold damage to all enemies caught in the blasts.

mortar_with_ground_effects.description: Like monster mortar skill, but leaves a ground effect on impact.

new_phase_run.description: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.

blast_rain.description: Fires an arrow up in the air, which splits and rains down in a series of explosions over an area. The explosions will always overlap on the targeted area.

shrapnel_shot.description: Fires an arrow that pierces through enemies. Arrows are fired with such force that they create a burst of lightning, damaging all enemies in a cone in front of the archer.

bladefall.description: Ethereal weapons rain from the sky, dealing damage to enemies in a sequence of five volleys, each wider but less damaging than the last. Enemies can be hit multiple times where these overlap.

blade_vortex.description: An ethereal blade spins around you for a duration, repeatedly damaging enemies that it passes through.

frost_bomb.description: Creates a crystal that pulses with cold for a duration. Each pulse applies a debuff to nearby enemies that reduces their cold resistance and life regeneration. When its duration ends, the crystal explodes, dealing heavy cold damage to enemies around it.

word_of_flames.description: Releases a nova of fire around you, damaging nearby enemies.

edict_of_flames.description: Releases a nova of fire around you, damaging nearby enemies.

decree_of_flames.description: Releases a nova of fire around you, damaging nearby enemies.

commandment_of_flames.description: Releases a nova of fire around you, damaging nearby enemies.

unique_animate_weapon.description: Releases Dancing Dervish to fight by your side. While Dancing Dervish is manifested, you have Onslaught and cannot use Weapons.

orb_of_storms.description: Creates a stationary electrical orb that frequently unleashes a splitting bolt of lightning at a nearby enemy. Using a lightning skill while inside the orb's cloud unleashes additional bolts. Casting this skill again will replace the previous orb. You can only cast this spell yourself, directly.

word_of_the_grave_on_kill.description: Summons three icy skull minions that explode at the end of their duration.

edict_of_the_grave_on_kill.description: Summons three icy skull minions that explode at the end of their duration.

decree_of_the_grave_on_kill.description: Summons three icy skull minions that explode at the end of their duration.

commandment_of_the_grave_on_kill.description: Summons three icy skull minions that explode at the end of their duration.

word_of_reflection_when_hit.description: Creates a clone of you that attacks with your weapon.

edict_of_reflection_when_hit.description: Creates a clone of you that attacks with your weapon.

decree_of_reflection_when_hit.description: Creates a clone of you that attacks with your weapon.

commandment_of_reflection_when_hit.description: Creates a clone of you that attacks with your weapon.

word_of_light_when_critically_hit.description: Deals a portion of your main hand damage in an area around you and creates Consecrated Ground, causing you and your allies to regenerate life.

edict_of_light_when_critically_hit.description: Deals a portion of your main hand damage in an area around you and creates Consecrated Ground, causing you and your allies to regenerate life.

decree_of_light_when_critically_hit.description: Deals a portion of your main hand damage in an area around you and creates Consecrated Ground, causing you and your allies to regenerate life.

commandment_of_light_when_critically_hit.description: Deals a portion of your main hand damage in an area around you and creates Consecrated Ground, causing you and your allies to regenerate life.

word_of_thunder_on_kill.description: Damaging cones of lightning surround you.

edict_of_thunder_on_kill.description: Damaging cones of lightning surround you.

decree_of_thunder_on_kill.description: Damaging cones of lightning surround you.

commandment_of_thunder_on_kill.description: Damaging cones of lightning surround you.

summon_rock_golem.description: Summons a Stone Golem that grants you life regeneration. In addition to its melee attack, the Stone Golem uses a rolling charge and a powerful slam that can taunt enemies.

word_of_force_on_hit.description: Release an arc of force from your weapon or fists, damaging enemies in front of you.

edict_of_force_on_hit.description: Release an arc of force from your weapon or fists, damaging enemies in front of you.

decree_of_force_on_hit.description: Release an arc of force from your weapon or fists, damaging enemies in front of you.

commandment_of_force_on_hit.description: Release an arc of force from your weapon or fists, damaging enemies in front of you.

word_of_war_on_kill.description: This attack is performed repeatedly by a ghostly imitation of your weapon.

edict_of_war_on_kill.description: This attack is performed repeatedly by a ghostly imitation of your weapon.

decree_of_war_on_kill.description: This attack is performed repeatedly by a ghostly imitation of your weapon.

commandment_of_war_on_kill.description: This attack is performed repeatedly by a ghostly imitation of your weapon.

righteous_lightning.description: Engulfs you in magical lightning that rapidly damages nearby enemies and drains your mana. Your critical strike chance is substantially increased while under this effect. The effect ends when you have no mana remaining.

earthquake.description: Smashes the ground with an Axe, Mace or Staff, dealing damage in an area and cracking the earth. The crack will erupt in a powerful aftershock after a short duration. Earthquakes created before the first one has erupted will not generate their own aftershocks.

contagion.description: Unleashes a vile contagion on enemies, dealing chaos damage over time. If an enemy dies while affected by Contagion, it spreads to other enemies.

wither.description: Casts a debilitating effect on enemies in an area, Hindering their movement and applying a stacking debuff that increases the Chaos Damage they take. This effect can stack up to 15 times.

wither_channel.description: Casts a debilitating effect on enemies in an area, Hindering their movement and applying a stacking debuff that increases the Chaos Damage they take. This effect can stack up to 15 times.

essence_drain.description: Fires a projectile that applies a damage over time debuff when it hits. You are healed for a portion of the debuff damage. The debuff is spread by Contagion.

word_of_inferno_on_kill.description: Drops a meteor from above on a nearby foe, dealing fire damage in an area around them.

edict_of_inferno_on_kill.description: Drops a meteor from above on a nearby foe, dealing fire damage in an area around them.

decree_of_inferno_on_kill.description: Drops a meteor from above on a nearby foe, dealing fire damage in an area around them.

commandment_of_inferno_on_kill.description: Drops a meteor from above on a nearby foe, dealing fire damage in an area around them.

word_of_frost.description: Fire a nova of icy projectiles.

edict_of_frost.description: Fire a nova of icy projectiles.

decree_of_frost.description: Fire a nova of icy projectiles.

commandment_of_frost.description: Fire a nova of icy projectiles.

word_of_blades.description: Fires a chaining burst of ethereal blades.

edict_of_blades.description: Fires a chaining burst of ethereal blades.

decree_of_blades.description: Fires a chaining burst of ethereal blades.

commandment_of_blades.description: Fires a chaining burst of ethereal blades.

word_of_spite_when_hit.description: Releases a nova of projectiles based on your weapon, leaving chilling ground in their wake.

edict_of_spite_when_hit.description: Releases a nova of projectiles based on your weapon, leaving chilling ground in their wake.

decree_of_spite_when_hit.description: Releases a nova of projectiles based on your weapon, leaving chilling ground in their wake.

commandment_of_spite_when_hit.description: Releases a nova of projectiles based on your weapon, leaving chilling ground in their wake.

word_of_fury_on_hit.description: Repeatedly fires a piercing projectile based on your weapon, converting some physical damage to fire. The projectiles form an arc in front of you.

edict_of_fury_on_hit.description: Repeatedly fires a piercing projectile based on your weapon, converting some physical damage to fire. The projectiles form an arc in front of you.

decree_of_fury_on_hit.description: Repeatedly fires a piercing projectile based on your weapon, converting some physical damage to fire. The projectiles form an arc in front of you.

commandment_of_fury_on_hit.description: Repeatedly fires a piercing projectile based on your weapon, converting some physical damage to fire. The projectiles form an arc in front of you.

siege_ballista.description: Summons a totem that attacks with piercing arrows. It attacks slowly, but deals increased damage.

totem_melee.description: Summons an Ancestor Totem which will attack enemies with melee strikes while you stand close to it. Being near it grants you more attack speed.

triggered_explosion.description: Release a fire nova when you kill an enemy.

sunder.description: Slams the ground with your main hand weapon, creating a wave of broken ground that damages enemies in an area in front of you. Enemies hit by the wave will release a circular shockwave, dealing damage to other enemies around them. Requires a Mace, Axe, or Staff.

range_finder.description: (DEVELOPMENT) A test skill for highlighting a certain range in-game

summon_rigwalds_pack.description: Summons a spectral wolf companion that attacks near by enemies and dies after a duration.

shock_ground.description: Creates a patch of Shocked Ground in a radius around you.

frost_bolt.description: Fires a slow-moving projectile that pierces through enemies, dealing cold damage.

frost_bolt_nova.description: An icy blast explodes around the caster, dealing cold damage to enemies, and leaving behind a whirling vortex that continues to deal cold damage over time and chill enemies caught in it. If the caster targets near one of their Frostbolt projectiles, it will explode from the projectile instead, destroying it.

blight_channel.description: Apply a debuff to enemies in front of you which deals chaos damage over time. Enemies who aren't already debuffed by Blight are also hindered for a shorter secondary duration, slowing their movement. Continued channelling adds layers of damage to the debuff, each with their own duration.

molten_burst.description: Launch molten projectiles from the point of impact, causing AoE attack damage to enemies where they land.

word_of_ire_when_hit.description: Release a lightning charged spinning copy of your weapon or its projectiles that rotates around a point, damaging enemies in an area.

edict_of_ire_when_hit.description: Release a lightning charged spinning copy of your weapon or its projectiles that rotates around a point, damaging enemies in an area.

decree_of_ire_when_hit.description: Release a lightning charged spinning copy of your weapon or its projectiles that rotates around a point, damaging enemies in an area.

commandment_of_ire_when_hit.description: Release a lightning charged spinning copy of your weapon or its projectiles that rotates around a point, damaging enemies in an area.

charged_attack.description: Requires 1h Sword, Dagger, or Claw weapon

charged_attack_channel.description: Repeatedly strike at enemies in a circle in front of you while channelling, dealing damage to and around the struck enemy. The damage is continually boosted while channelling. You unleash an additional strike for each stage reached once the channelling ends. Requires a Dagger, Claw or One-Handed Sword.

repeating_shockwave.description: While you run, this skill creates a small explosion with each step, dealing fire damage in an area around you.

spirit_offering.description: Consumes a corpse, granting energy shield, extra chaos damage and elemental resistances to your minions. The new energy shield is recovered as it's granted. The skill consumes other nearby corpses, increasing the duration and amount of energy shield granted for each corpse consumed.

doom_arrow.description: Fires doom arrows in a direction toward target

summon_lightning_golem.description: Summons a Lightning Golem that grants you increased Attack and Cast speed. The Lightning Golem fires a projectile spell, creates orbs of Lightning that zap nearby enemies, and casts a temporary aura that grants added Lightning Damage to spells and attacks used by the Golem and its nearby allies.

izaro_temporal_chains.description: Curses all targets in an area, Slowing them, and making effects on them expire more slowly.

izaro_vulnerability.description: Curses all targets in an area, making them take increased physical damage and degeneration.

izaro_elemental_weakness.description: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to elemental damage.

ancestor_totem_slam.description: Summons an Ancestor Totem that will attack enemies with a powerful main hand slam while you stand close to it. Being near it grants you more melee damage.

double_slash.description: Slashes twice, releasing waves of force that damage enemies they hit. Enemies in the middle of the slashes can be hit by both. If you are dual wielding, you attack with your Main Hand, then your Off Hand. Can be used with Axes and Swords.

elemental_projectiles.description: Fires a burst of three piercing projectiles in an arc in front of you.

dark_pact.description: This spell removes some life from one of your Skeleton minions near you or the targeted location to deal chaos damage in an area around it. This effect will chain to your other nearby skeletons. If you have no skeletons near you or the targeted location, it will sacrifice your own life to deal damage instead.

monster_aura_increased_damage_taken.description: Enemies affected by this aura will take increased damage from all sources

monster_summon_daemons_at_locators.description: Spawns daemons in specific locations to restrict player movement skills

monster_aura_take_damage_on_movement_ski.displayedname: Damage On Movement Skill Use Aura
monster_aura_take_damage_on_movement_ski.description: Enemies affected by this aura will be dealt damage on using a movement skill

monster_flask_charge_nova.description: Enemies hit by this nova will lose half of their current stored flask charges

monster_bleed_nova.description: Enemies hit by this nova will bleed

wand_teleport.description: Fires a projectile and teleports you in the opposite direction

curse_nova.description: Fires projectiles in a nova, converting all their physical damage to a random element, and grants a buff which makes you immune to curses for a duration.

fire_beam.description: Unleash a beam of fire that burns enemies it touches, and decreases their fire resistance. Remaining in the beam intensifies the burning, adding a portion of the beam's damage in stages. Enemies who leave the beam continue to burn for a duration. Increasing cast speed also increases the rate at which the beam can turn.

fire_burst.description: A burst of flame errupts from the location of a hit, dealing fire damage.

summon_essence_spirits.description: Summons three invulnerable spectral skulls that rush at nearby enemies and attack them rapidly. Enemies will not engage these spirits, and can pass through them.

monster_mortar_around_caster.description: Generic monster mortar skill. Like Monster Projectile but has an impact effect. Casts mortar around caster instead of target location.

new_blade_vortex.description: An ethereal blade spins around you for a duration, repeatedly damaging enemies that it passes through.

new_new_blade_vortex.description: This spell creates ethereal blades which orbit in an area around you, dealing damage every 0.6 seconds to all enemies in their radius. As more blades are added, the damage becomes greater and more frequent.

thrown_shield_projectile.description: Throws a spectral copy of your shield as a projectile which cannot pierce, and deals off-hand damage augmented by the defences of the shield. When it collides with something it will shatter, launching a number of smaller shards as projectiles in all directions. Modifiers that cause additional projectiles to be fired will add more shards, not more copies of the shield.

envy.description: Casts an aura that adds chaos damage to the attacks and spells of you and your allies.

breach_bone_nova_triggered.description: A nova of bones erupts around you, dealing physical damage.

icicle_nova_triggered.description: This attack fires icy projectiles in a nova around you, dealing attack damage with all physical damage converted to cold.

triggered_lightning_spell.description: A bolt of lightning strikes an area, dealing lightning damage.

triggered_summon_spider.description: Raise two spectral spiders from each nearby corpse that will leap towards and attack your enemies. Enemies will not engage the spiders directly.

storm_burst.description: Unleash a stream of projectiles while you channel this spell, which pierce through enemies, dealing lightning damage. When you stop channelling, the projectiles explode, dealing significant damage in an area around them. Additional projectiles are added in sequence.

summon_skeletons_channelled.description: Summons slow moving skeletal minions that decay over time. Does not require a corpse to be consumed.

blood_offering.description: Consumes a corpse, and sacrifices a portion of your life, granting your minions life regeneration based on the life sacrificed, and a bonus to damage. The skill consumes other nearby corpses, increasing the duration and life regeneration for each corpse consumed.

create_lesser_shrine.description: Creates a Lesser Shrine, which will grant a bonus when touched. The Lesser Shrine will disappear after a short duration, or when used. This skill starts on cooldown.

charged_dash.description: Channel to project a mirage forward in the direction you're facing, based on your movement speed. Release to teleport to the mirage dealing area of effect damage multiple times along the way. Travelling further applies a bonus to the damage as well as dealing damage in larger areas. Faster attack speed and lower movement speed will both cause damage to be dealt more frequently along the path.

chaos_degen_aura_unique.description: Casts an aura that deals Chaos Damage over Time to nearby Enemies. This skill cannot be cast by Totems.

player_lightning_slam.description: The character uses their fist to slam the ground in front of them, with less attack speed, but more damage. This attack deals Lightning Damage to enemies in a large area, with a chance to Shock them. Cannot be used while wielding a Weapon. Cannot be supported by Multistrike.

summon_beastial_rhoa.description: Summons a Bestial Rhoa. In addition to its melee attack, the Bestial Rhoa uses a charge and has an aura that intimidates enemies. This minion's hits cannot be evaded.

summon_beastial_ursa.description: Summons a Bestial Ursa. In addition to its melee attack, the Bestial Ursa uses a powerful Ground Slam and Rallying Cry. This minion's hits cannot be evaded.

summon_beastial_snake.description: Summons a Bestial Snake. The Bestial Snake fires powerful chaos projectile attacks. This minion's hits cannot be evaded.

summon_harbinger_of_the_arcane.description: Summons an immortal Harbinger minion. The minion will occasionally cast Arcane Surge on you, granting More Spell Damage, Cast Speed and Mana Regeneration.

summon_harbinger_of_time.description: Summons an immortal Harbinger minion. The minion will occasionally create a Slipstream aura on you that increases the Action Speed of you, and all allies and enemies near you.

summon_harbinger_of_focus.description: Summons an immortal Harbinger minion. While you are channelling, the minion will occasionally cast a buff on you that reduces the Damage you take, and makes you avoid all Stuns and Ailments.

summon_harbinger_of_directons.description: Summons an immortal Harbinger minion. The minion will cast a random buff on you that grants one or all of the following: 1 additional Projectile, +1 Chain, Pierce 1 additional Target, and Projectiles Fork.

summon_harbinger_of_storms.description: Summons an immortal Harbinger minion. The minion will occasionally apply a Chill or Shock to an enemy that chains to other nearby enemies.

summon_harbinger_of_brutality.description: Summons an immortal Harbinger minion. The minion will occasionally grant you significantly increased Damage, Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and reduce the Damage you take.

darktongue_kiss.description: Apply a debuff to Enemies which deals Chaos Damage over Time.

void_gaze.description: Applies a debuff to Enemies, removing some of their resistance to Chaos damage.

volatile_dead.description: Corpses near the targeted location explode, dealing damage in a small area and creating an orb which moves towards nearby enemies before dealing spell damage in a larger area. The explosion of the corpse is not affected by modifiers to spell damage, and cannot be reflected.

create_smoke_cloud.description: Creates a Smoke Cloud in an area, which blinds enemies within it.

unearth.description: Fires a projectile that will pierce through enemies to impact the ground at the targeted location, creating a Bone Archer corpse where it lands.

cremation.description: A targeted corpse explodes, dealing area damage and turning into a volcanic geyser, which will repeatedly unleash projectiles sequentially over the surrounding area for a duration. The explosion of the corpse is not affected by modifiers to spell damage, and cannot be reflected.

bodyswap.description: Your body explodes, dealing spell damage in an area around you, and a targeted corpse also explodes, dealing damage around it. Your body is recreated at the location of the corpse. The explosion of the corpse is not affected by modifiers to spell damage, and cannot be reflected. This spell cannot be repeated.

aegis_fire.description: Calls forth a protective aegis which takes fire damage from hits for you until depleted. The aegis will be restored to its full value after a short delay if you stop taking fire damage from hits.

aegis_cold.description: Calls forth a protective aegis which takes cold damage from hits for you until depleted. The aegis will be restored to its full value after a short delay if you stop taking cold damage from hits.

aegis_elemental.description: Calls forth a protective aegis which takes elemental damage from hits for you until depleted. The aegis will be restored to its full value after a short delay if you stop taking elemental damage from hits.

curse_pillar.description: Summons an effigy of Doedre, which will project auras of all the curse skill gems socketed in Doedre's Skin.

endurance_charge_slam.description: Slam the ground with your main hand weapon, unleashing a fiery fissure in front of you, dealing area damage and releasing a random number of smaller fissures branching off from it. If you have Endurance Charges, the number of fissures will be maximised, and one Endurance Charge will be consumed. Requires a Mace, Sword, Axe, Staff, or Unarmed.

death_walk.description: While you walk, this skill causes corpses near your steps to explode, dealing fire damage in an area. The explosions of the corpses are not affected by modifiers to spell damage, and cannot be reflected.

spirit_burst.description: Consumes a spirit charge to fire projectiles which deals physical damage.

despair.description: Curse all targets in an area, making them less resistant to chaos damage and causing them to take increased damage over time. Cursed enemies also take additional chaos damage when hit.

shade_form.description: Makes you immune to physical damage, and harder for enemies to detect, for a duration.

summon_petrification_statue.description: Creates a Petrification Statue in front of you, which will slow enemies with its gaze, until they become fully petrified.

void_shot.description: Fires an arrow which decelerates to the target location, the arrow will then become unstable and explode dealing weapon damage in an area, converting half of the physical damage to cold damage.

tentacle_smash.description: This attack causes three otherworldly tentacles to strike the ground around you, each dealing your attack damage in an area.

summon_void_sphere.description: Creates an orb which moves towards nearby enemies, exploding after a duration or when it gets close enough. The explosion deals cold spell damage in an area, and leaves behind a Vortex on the ground for a secondary duration which continues to deal cold damage over time and chill enemies caught in it.

intimidating_cry.description: Performs a warcry, granting the user and nearby allies increased attack speed if there are nearby enemies. The attack speed increase is proportional to the number of surrounding enemies. Taunts all nearby enemies to attack the user, and Intimidates them. Shares a cooldown with other Warcry skills.

aspect_cat.description: While active, grants the Cat's Stealth and Cat's Agility buffs in sequence. Cat's Stealth increases your critical strike chance, makes you harder to see, and gives you a chance to avoid damage for a short duration. Cat's Agility increases your attack and cast speed for a longer secondary duration.

aspect_bird.description: While active, grants the Avian's Might and Avian's Flight buffs in sequence. Avian's Might grants you and your minions a chance to deal Double Damage with hits for a duration. Avian's Flight grants you and your minions increased Movement Speed for a secondary duration.

aspect_spider.description: While active, periodically applies a Spider's Web debuff to nearby Enemies, and Hinders them. Each Spider's Web on an Enemy increases the Damage they take. Hinder reduces their movement speed.

aspect_crab.description: While active, periodically adds Crab Barriers to you, and grants additional Physical Damage reduction for each Crab Barrier you have. All Crab Barriers are lost when you take physical damage from a hit.

avian_tornado.description: Launches an unpredictable, piercing tornado projectile that moves randomly for a duration, repeatedly dealing damage to enemies it intersects.

blinding_aura.description: Casts an aura that blinds enemies in a radius.
